vote.title: Authorize the First Amendment to the Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County for the Right of Way boundary survey, and preparing easement documents and legal descriptions for the Cypress Waters Trail located at South Belt Line Road heading east to South North Lake Road- Not to exceed $159,833.00 - Financing: Stormwater Drainage Management Fund
